title: A Mismatched Crew Dreams Of Swashbuckling In 'We Are Pirates'
teaser: Acclaimed writer Daniel Handler, a.k.a. Lemony Snickett, drew criticism last year for a racist comment at a literary event. NPR's Scott Simon speaks with Handler about his new novel, We Are Pirates.
